author: Fortnite
description:
Reload is getting a new map, Nitemare Island, featuring a “greatest hits” of POIs from Fortnitemares past! Drop in for a terrifying trip down memory lane, along with a new loot pool and ranked reset.

title: Reload Nitemare Island Trailer
